item.title: How to Prep for a Hackathon as a Designer
item.description: Team Culture Make sure your team values design. And I mean values design. On one hand, there are some people who outwardly say they value design. And it is a very easy thing to say, so understanding what they really mean gives more clarity. However, when someone is truly not listening to your design decisions, all hell can break loose. And I’m not just talking about hell for you, my friend.
